value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI).

images.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Understand and create the different types of disk storage available to Azure virtual machines (VMs).

images.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure supports three approaches to deploying cloud resources - public, private, and the hybrid cloud. Selecting between them will change several factors of the services you move into Azure including cost, maintenance requirements, and security. In this module, we will look at all three types and help you make an informed decision about which one to leverage for your services. We'll also quickly look at the service models supported by Azure which can help you determine the services you should start with when planning out an Azure deployment.

images.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure

value.title: Assess your existing software development process
value.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using Durable Functions.

images.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: SQL elastic pools allow you to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

images.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Introduction to Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: Integrate data sources with your Azure Functions serverless logic by using bindings.

images.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn to foster the DevOps values of transparency and team cooperation with Azure Boards.

images.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Implement the publish-subscribe pattern in the cloud using Azure Queue storage.

images.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and errors.

images.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Explore the relational model for databases, how tables are structured, how you can use indexes to improve query performance, and how you can use views to simplify complex queries.

images.title: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Use the Azure Functions Core Tools to create and run functions on a development computer and publish them to Azure.

images.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools

value.excerpt: Create test and deploy Azure Functions using Visual studio and how to manage Azure Function code.

value.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
value.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase

value.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
value.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

value.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI.

images.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will see how Azure Data Lake Storage can make processing Big Data analytical solutions more efficient and how easy it is to set up. You will also explore how it fits into common architectures, as well as the different methods of uploading the data to the data store. You will finally examine the myriad of security features that will ensure your data is secure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory

value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

images.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
